import React, { Component } from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router } from "react-router-dom"; import { MDBSideNavCat, MDBSideNavNav, MDBSideNav, MDBSideNavLink, MDBContainer, MDBIcon, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; import DocsLink from "./../../components/docsLink"; import SectionContainer from "./../../components/sectionContainer"; class SideNavPage extends Component { state = { sideNavLeft: false, sideNavRight: false }; sidenavToggle = sidenavId => () => { const sidenavNr = `sideNav${sidenavId}`; this.setState({ [sidenavNr]: !this.state[sidenavNr] }); }; render() { return ( {/* the left SideNav: */}
    • Submit listing Submit listing Registration form For bloggers For authors Instruction Monthly meetings FAQ Write a message     {/* the right SideNav: */}
    • Submit listing Registration form For bloggers For authors Instruction Monthly meetings FAQ Write a message     ); } } export default SideNavPage;
